messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-Discussion] Farming (Nancy)
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 7/8/2003 9:12:23 AM Eastern Standard Time, ... I want to wish you lots and lots of luck.  Building our house was one of the hardest things
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 7/8/2003 9:12:23 AM Eastern Standard Time,
Earthmomma67@... writes:

> We're building a shelter-kit home. It's called a barn house. It's a kit.
> Our
> delivery date is NOVEMBER 28th!! Argghh!! Well, I've waited this long.
> We also plan on using as much salvaged materials as we can

I want to wish you lots and lots of luck. Building our house was one of the
hardest things we've ever done. Just keep encouraging each other, try to hold
your tongue when it comes to criticisms...the key is COMPROMISE!!

The house sounds WONDERFUL...beautiful!....I wish my husband was a little
more open to my artistic side when it comes to our house. The outside
doesn't/won't look as cool as yours, but he is willing to bite his tongue and let me
paint the inside and decorate as I want (we are adding on and re-doing a lot of
stuff as we speak.)

November...where are you located again? You may be in for an unbelievable
race to finish before the snow flies. Our first snow was in October here last
year!! Keep us posted!! :o)

Nancy


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-Discussion] Farming (Nancy)
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 7/8/03 9:55:08 AM, kbcdlovejo@aol.com writes:  working funky shutters ... I vote PINK!  Pink and green? TOOO fairy. Blue.  Green and
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 7/8/03 9:55:08 AM, kbcdlovejo@... writes:

<< > working funky shutters
> that will be another color (can't decide yet)

I vote PINK! >>

Pink and green?

TOOO fairy.

Blue. Green and blue.

Or if pinkish, at least go lavender or some light purple.

Why should all the shutters be the same color though?

Gold on some. Purple on some.

Or if pink, throw in some sparkly stuff. Mica powder or glitter or something
glitzy.

Sandra

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-Discussion] Farming (Nancy)
messages.msgSnippet: We re building a shelter-kit home. It s called a barn house. It s a kit. Our delivery date is NOVEMBER 28th!! Argghh!! Well, I ve waited this long. We also
messages.messageBody:
We're building a shelter-kit home. It's called a barn house. It's a kit. Our
delivery date is NOVEMBER 28th!! Argghh!! Well, I've waited this long.
We also plan on using as much salvaged materials as we can, I want this house
to look like it's been there a while. It will have 1x12 vertical siding,
stained purple, with a teal front door, green windows, and working funky shutters
that will be another color (can't decide yet) I want this to look as if
Fairies built it.
I'm very excited about it!!
We plan on having animals, goats and horses for sure, maybe a Llama. And
chickens, too.

*~*Elissa Jill*~*
unschooling Momma to 3 beautiful brilliant people
Loving partner for life to Joey
terrible guitarist, fair singer and happy woman.






[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
